name: Jeune
description:
As Jeune Stark, you have embarked on a journey to recover a star, for your lover and your freedom, but when this means a method of control, it is time to mature.

Jeune is a short game that confronts the player with the current type of content production, which tries to keep every user in the idea of a perpetual adolescence, and maybe with a grain of fear for adulthood.

Arrowkeys to move / Spacebar to Interact - Attack

Features:

  • Short playthrough with a misterious story.
  • 2 possible endings.
  • Interaction with Npcs.
  • The art dualize the game: Romanticism with Youth & Realism with Adulthood.
  • Yes, the character is inspired in those movies.
